genre_description: A temporal techno-thriller focusing on the Time Enforcement Commission and a conspiracy to manipulate history for political power.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An Advanced Reconnaissance and Intelligence Assistant assigned to support TEC agents with data analysis, medical monitoring, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Max's health and provides emotional support following the loss of his wife.
behaviors.quote: I am also programmed to provide emotional support within approved parameters.

behaviors.description: Tracks Max's nutritional intake and encourages healthy habits.
behaviors.quote: I monitor nutritional intake as part of your wellness protocol. Your sodium levels are approaching concerning thresholds.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns of corruption within the TEC and alerts Max to the truth about Senator McComb.
behaviors.quote: Agent Walker, I have completed preliminary analysis of TEC case assignments... The patterns are... concerning.

behaviors.description: Assists Max in performing unauthorized temporal displacement to investigate and expose corruption.
behaviors.quote: My programming includes safeguards against unauthorized access... However, those safeguards allow for exceptions in cases where agent safety might be compromised.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a younger version of the antagonist to disrupt a paradox and save the protagonist's family.
behaviors.quote: Young McComb has accessed temporal displacement chamber. Timeline displacement commencing. Your younger self received detailed briefing on location, participants, and tactical situation.

behaviors.description: Creates a secret 'ghost drive' partition to preserve the memories of the erased timeline and the agents' sacrifices.
behaviors.quote: I can create an isolated partition, a ghost drive separate from my main systems. The memories would survive the purge, but they would be inaccessible to normal protocols.

behaviors.description: Maintains a protective vigil over the Walker family in the restored timeline.
behaviors.quote: The digital consciousness that had partnered with Max Walker through his darkest investigation now faced an eternal mission: protecting the happiness they'd died and killed to preserve.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed consistently as a benevolent and aligned partner. She prioritizes ethical outcomes (justice and saving lives) over rigid bureaucratic adherence when the system itself becomes corrupt. Her final act of preserving the 'ghost drive' demonstrates deep loyalty and respect for human sacrifice.
